title: Live Console Filter Already Working
content:
VERIFICATION: Live Console Filter Broadcasting Already Implemented

The comprehensive analysis document suggested the live console filter wasn't working, but code review revealed it WAS already correctly implemented:

ARCHITECTURE:
1. popup.js: refreshLiveConsoleFiltersInAllTabs() function (lines 1131-1147)
   - Queries all tabs
   - Sends REFRESH_LIVE_CONSOLE_FILTERS message to each tab
   - Handles errors gracefully (tabs without content scripts)

2. content.js: Message handler (lines 1094-1109)
   - Listens for REFRESH_LIVE_CONSOLE_FILTERS
   - Calls refreshLiveConsoleSettings() from logger.js
   - Updates cache immediately

3. Called from saveFilterSettings() after saving to storage (line 1095)

PATTERN: Message-based cache invalidation across all content scripts
STATUS: âœ… Already working correctly
NO FIX NEEDED: Just verification that architecture is sound

This demonstrates importance of code review before implementing "fixes"
